website_summaries.verdict: Danner designers are known for making long-lasting footwear, and in the case of the Explorer—concerning its durability, they have seemingly made yet another masterpiece. Their brilliance in boot-making can also be seen in the hiker’s A-grade waterproofing, super-precise fit, and overflowing amounts of comfort. That said, the gear, with all its trail-worthy characteristics, is not without a few faults. Indeed, some questioned its width, while some lambasted its cumbersome weight. Nevertheless, the Danner Explorer is an excellent choice for those who find its strengths quite empowering in their adventures.
pros: A number of users found a true-to-size fit in their Danner Explorer boots
Many owners were impressed with the hiker’s effective waterproofing
Its high comfort level captivated several wearers
The Explorer was praised by a group of reviewers for having superb durability
Less than a handful of testers, including a shoe critic by profession, commended the outsole’s amazing grip performance
An expert spoke quite positively of the boot’s astonishingly flexible collar
cons: Some hikers were not happy about the its narrowness, especially around the forefoot
A few patrons criticized the Danner Explorer for its unflattering heaviness
This above-the-ankle hiking footgear disappointed a professional blogger with its hit-or-miss arch support
A couple of customers detested the boot’s time-demanding break-in phase

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Based on Danner's recommendations, I ordered a half-size smaller. They seemed to fit fine. I put some Ener-Gel inserts in them, and they became much tighter. It seems that either my feet are changing size periodically, or these shoes are. Sometimes, I can barely get my feet into them. And when they are tight like that, they hurt. Finally after about 3-4 weeks, they might be breaking-in. Recently, they've been more comfortable. But I still don't think they're completely broken-in yet. I'm sure once they're completely broken-in, they'll be great. I would suggest getting them in the size that you actually wear. I probably would have avoided a lot of pain if I had gotten these in my actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Physicist

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Danner.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with these Danner Explorers. This is my first pair of Danner boots and for the price they fall short I am a boot person and buy American as much as possible. I am a out door person hiking, horses, hunting I have owned many boots that cost a lot less and are of better quality. The fie of the Danner explorer as mentioned is small and come with no insoles the laces are too long the one sole is offset not straight. They are fairly comfortable they are still new I lust got my Danner insoles will see how they work out but as of now I would not buy another pair of Danner Boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money I was expecting excellent boots these are good boots and $100-$150 range but for $285 I expected a lot more I actually never even tried them on because the quality was not up to par I’m going to get some nicks or Frank’s or white boots for only $150 more and get the real deal
customer_reviews.author: MR.DIESELSMOKE

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and did not require much break in
customer_reviews.text: These boots are top quality. They are very comfortable and did not require much break in. I ordered the wide and it fits my foot perfectly. I have come to learn that non Asian made shoes like these run large and wide. They are very light weight when compared to Redwings.
customer_reviews.author: Cato

customer_reviews.title: Defect, so went with Mtn Lt 2. Woodburry C.S. SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Boots seem great, fit felt great. But as I was breaking them in on first day, the leather starting coming out from under one of the shoelace eyelets- seemed like it would compromise integrity of waterproof layer or leather itself at some point. Sent back as defect. It could be a design flaw with those upper eyelets- I like the bootlace eyelets on the Danner Mountain Light II's much better, so ended up getting a pair of those. But, if the eyelets had held up, would really loved these boots Im sure. Oh, and woodburry outfitters customer service is VERY slow. Try to buy from amazon if you can...
customer_reviews.author: B.A.R.27

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Made In the USA
customer_reviews.text: These Hiking Boots are the fulfillment of a desired purchase for over 4 decades. I am now an old person and the baility to purchase a high quality shoe like this is a rare quality today!
customer_reviews.author: C. Wayne Donham

customer_reviews.title: These are great boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Danner boots I have owned and they are great! The first pair lasted over four years of almost daily use. These boot are not cheap, but they are sure to last. A plus is that they are Made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots brand new. Delevered to my door.... defective!!!The leather on the heel is wrinkled and loose as if its not adhered to the inside. There is also a hole in leather that was obviously repaired. I have 2 other pairs of Danners and sworn by them. Total dissapointment. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: although it's very good looking also
customer_reviews.text: My feet is around 9W, the size is properly. But I don't understand why danner gave a half insole. So I bought a danner full size insole, and it fit well. The leather of the boots is quite thick, and very hard, although it's very good looking also. But it still take me few hours to suit it. By the way, it's a little bit short than Danner blackhawk II/ 24600, I thought they are same beside the color.
customer_reviews.author: David WANG ZJ

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great. I've had them for about a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. I've had them for about a month and they are breaking in nicely. Danners are expensive, but you really can't go wrong. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Chester A.

customer_reviews.title: Very good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Danner probably makes the VERY best boot available, but buying them on-line is risky unless you go to the Danner web-site FIRST, which I did not. This is a GREAT boot, but because of the boot last it is made on....it is very narrow!! A size 12 EE felt like a normal size twelve..and cramped up my pinky toe....which does sound freaking funny, UNLESS its YOUR pinky toe, sadly I sold them at an on-line auction and got part of my money back.....Live and Learn!
customer_reviews.author: 1MtnOgre

customer_reviews.title: Danners are top-notch
customer_reviews.text: Danner always seem to be very good for my feet and make it enjoyable to walk long distances and stand for long periods of time. Every pair of Danners that I have owned has been extremely durable and very comfortable. They are the only kind of boots that I wear, and I've tried most of the rest of them, including Red Wings and Matterhorns. They are expensive but well worth it. Amazon.com had the best price by far and their customer service is absolutely great!
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots, wished they fit
customer_reviews.text: When I got my feet measured the lady at the store said my wider foot was between a D and EE, so I hoped these would fit. I have always needed a EE boot which is what I ordered; I also have a high instep (slope from toes to ankle). I could tell when I saw them, they weren't going to fit. For an EE boot, I thought they were mis-marked. Love the way the look and I wish I could keep them, but they have to go back. I don't think going up a 1/2 size will solve the instep problem even if it solves the width issue.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and workmanship of the boot. Its built to last but.... They're too dang narrow. Even a EE is snug. I mean its narrower than a "regular" size. For +$200 they shouldnt be this way. Luckily I know how to stretch them out. Soak in hot water for 30 minutes and wear em till they dry.
customer_reviews.author: TheBear

customer_reviews.title: Great boots love them
customer_reviews.text: Awesome USA made boots! I am a mailman and need go walking shoes. Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Scalp lock taker

customer_reviews.title: Runs very narrow for an EE
customer_reviews.text: Way to narrow for a slightly wide foot. Normally wear a 10EE in everything but in these, no way. Love the boots just wish the EE was actually an EE. If you have a narrow or average foot get them, otherwise no way.
customer_reviews.author: piryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Money Can Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pair to replace my old pair of Danner Explorers that are 16 years old. That pair has been resoled 2 times and are worn on a regular basis. Danner boots are the best you can buy. I have small feet, and Danner boots are the only boots that I have found that fit, and perform comfortably. With this pair I now own 6 pair of Danner boots.
customer_reviews.author: CJG

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas this year. He was so pleased when he saw them and then tried them on and they fit perfect. Great Boot, waterproof and made in Oregon. YEAH
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable boots ever.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box...go hiking without any discomfort. The size 12D was spot on with wear of lighter sox. Not particularly heavy. You can see from the picture that the boots look great. Good price and they are re-craftable which I have had used on other Danner boots and it's a great service. If you are like me and wear boots out fast then it pays to purchase boots which can be reconditioned.
customer_reviews.author: GORDON KADATZ

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these because I wanted nice boots that were made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I wanted nice boots that were made in the USA, these fit the bill. I love the fit, very comfortable out of the box. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: bstew

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Best Boots I've Ever Had. They do take a number of weeks to break in and after a few months the shoe laces wear and come undone easily. The plastic inserts they included hurt my heels after a few months so I trashed them. Boots are very warm in sub zero weather. By far the most comfortable boots I've ever had and they look awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Guide

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this boot to replace a pair of LL. Bean hikers I have had for years. I believe this pair will outlast my old ones and although I have only had them for a couple weeks they are already very comfortable. I have not been on any long hikes yet but I am sure they will do everything I expect and hope they will do. Danner = Quality
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great boots this is my second pair. Still use the old pair doing things that beat boots up. Saving the new pair for hiking only. Old pair is 6-7 years old and still going strong. USA made!!!
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality uninsulated boot suitable for hiking and other outdoor activity. Good support and requires minimal break in time although they do get even more comfortable over time. Should last for years with reasonable care.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like a Glove
customer_reviews.text: Danner makes excellent boots. And the fact that they are made in the U.SA. since 1932, makes it an even better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: came with broken shoe lace!!
customer_reviews.text: Called danner and they are sending me new laces..shouldnt happen , it's annoying
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Danner boots ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of boots! I have resoled once after having them for 3 years. This is well worth the price and I even wore them for one of the years in a war zone. Even well worn but they still have another 5 years left in them... at least. My feet stay dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: LESTER

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of boots. It took me about a week and a half to break them in. They are extremely comfortable and really well made. I highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the best Danner's I've ever purchased. I have several and all are good but these take the cake. I have the Fort Lewis boots which Ive owned for 10 years or so, they are still a solid boot but can be too hot. I two pair of their hiking boots, but neither of them are nearly as nice as this boot. This boot is super comfortable and my feet do not overheat. I recommend this boot hands down!
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Customer service at it's best
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Danner boots for years. Sizing a boot for proper fit can be a arduous process. With help from Danner's Customer Service and Amazon return policy I was able to buy a well fitting, comfortable, Made In USA boot.. Many thanks to both companies
customer_reviews.author: Jim50el

customer_reviews.title: but then they fit like a pair of running shoes (albeit more heavy)
customer_reviews.text: It takes a couple weeks to break these in, but then they fit like a pair of running shoes (albeit more heavy)
customer_reviews.author: JaviPT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boots but they require a thick pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality boots but they require a thick pair of socks and several weeks to break in as the leather is stiff. If you wear them out of the box you will have to wear thick socks or you will have blisters
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Standard Danner Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of Danners earlier this year, a purchase which started a collection of several Danners. This particular style has a very minimal break-in period. I look forward to many years of service from these and my other Danners, and the re-furbishing service that Danner has will keep them serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: aviator

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I am in construction and have used this style and model of boot for about 20 years now. I like how they fit and they are pretty waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA!!! So very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely wonderful. Comfortable and conforms to the feet very well. These boots look real good also. Almost too nice for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Crock

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: love these boots, can't take them off, so comfy. The fit is exactly as described (I'm a 9 wide), just can't wait to wear them off a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Denis C.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, straightforward
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, straightforward, solid, reasonably comfortable, but run at least a size large, and feel roomier as they break in (which takes a few days). With different laces they dress up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Not good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair with defect in both right boots that cause them not to fit well. Otherwise would get 5 stars. Will try one more pair an update review
customer_reviews.author: G.Newman

customer_reviews.title: Good fall & spring boot
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a set of lighter New Balance trails shoes. These are much more durable, and fit just fine. I have hard-to-fit wide feet and these slipped on just fine. The supporting insert is a Godsend. They work well for all-day walking outside in remote northern New England terrain, but I switch to heftier-insulated boots in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, if you want good looking real leather boots that will last buy these boots
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footwear
customer_reviews.text: I have put lots of boots on my feet during my lifetime and these are the best feeling snug supportive boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: The Stantons

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat tradition
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced my 1994 Danner Explorer Boots(still have them just wear them around the place now). I have had outstanding success with Danner boots in general-the Explorer model is my favorite- hiking, working outside, etc. Amazon had the best price and speedy delivery as always.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Danner Explorers rock.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife, after her liking mine so much. She loves them and wears them to the office. They take a great shine are very soft. Danner last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredjumper

customer_reviews.title: Great boots from the land we love!
customer_reviews.text: Made in America, now that's a phrase you don't see very often any more. These boots fit right, feel good and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss...
customer_reviews.text: These Danners are the best boots I've ever owned. Very comfortable with the vibram sole. I will never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Caudle

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for a week and they are almost broke in. They seemed tight at first, but after wearing them a few times they are fine. I noticed the quality immediately compared to other boots I have owned. I expect to have these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Danner Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of Danner boots that are made in USA and every one has met or surpassed my expectations. The ones that are imported, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: mgardzalla

customer_reviews.title: Explorer Boots
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go with the made in the U.S.A. Danner boots, but wish I wouldn't have. Although Amazon is awesome and let me return them. After about 2 weeks, something in the heel (must be plastic) broke and it made a clicking sound while putting them on and a little bit when walking. Was very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jetley

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The boot was too narrow for me even with the 2E width I ordered.Too bad I loved the boot . I wear 12 EE running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: k177

customer_reviews.title: narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a wide and even that was too narrow in the toes. Way too narrow for a regular size let alone a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot, if pricey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction. Very well made. Comfortable, but the design of the boot is narrow. So if you have wide feet, you will find these boots do not fit. Price is not cheap. But boot has held up well and should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wetterstrom

customer_reviews.title: DANNER BOOTS - THE GOLD STANDARD!!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing lacking is a color option - I would have preferred black, lol!! I dyed the brown pair I bought ... SHAZAM!! PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.author: Havoc Man

customer_reviews.title: Another great Danner product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to receive these boots so quickly. They were well packaged and, as I am accustomed to great products from Danner, these were no exception. Good fit. Took a little longer than usual to get comfortable with a higher fit on my ankle. Otherwise, the boot is already one of the best I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any break in time at all. It is wonderful to be able to buy boots made in the USA and for them to be as great as these have been for me. Comfortable and rugged - - perfect hiking boots for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blue_Sky

customer_reviews.title: Danner Explorer hikers
customer_reviews.text: After a few days to break them in I love them, remains to be seen how they hold up yet Sizes seem to run big so I had to return the first pair for a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Danner Quality
customer_reviews.text: What else can be said about Danner Boots except they are the absolute best.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Took awhile to break in
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Took awhile to break in, but they really do feel like cushioned running shoes. I really could wear them all day every day.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fills like good quality but was just a littile on the big side and will Chang sizes
customer_reviews.author: Eag

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Danner boots in this style. I have had other style Danner boots, but this is my favorite. They are light weight, comfortable, and the most durable boots I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: GBLW

customer_reviews.title: thank you danner
customer_reviews.text: Grrrreat boots. First time I ordered I received two different boots but returns was easy and fairly quick. The second pair I decided to go down a half size. I have short fat feet so I went with extra wide or EE. Big difference when the boot fits properly. Had them about two weeks and almost broke in. Just been wearing them to work at a hotel to break them in before I really put them to the test in the wilderness. They fit a little snug at first but they doo stretch when breaking in. All and all they seem great. The construction of course is top notch and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Perron

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed with the Vibram Sole!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Danner supporter for most of my Professional life as a Log Home Designer & Builder. I have relied and trusted Danner boots for many years, and continue purchasing them when I need to. The ONE & ONLY COMPLAINT I have with THIS model is the fact that the VIBRAM SOLE WEARS OUT WAY TOO EARLY!!! I am possibly purchasing a boot every year and a half. A $300.00 boot should last longer than that. It's ridiculous. I am aware of the re-soling capabilities of these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good fit just haven't used very much yet! The arch supports are nice!
customer_reviews.author: corey norlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Danners!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots! He wears them 7 days a week and they last and last. Very well made and Amazon has a great price! We are used to paying $329 in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are great. it's my own mistake to purchase the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Wenyi ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: Danner boots are of the highest quality boots on the market. This was my 4th purchase from danner. I will not own any other boot.
customer_reviews.author: adam thompson

customer_reviews.title: these boots felt like old friends
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 days of wear, these boots felt like old friends!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh O Love

customer_reviews.title: Danner Men's Explorer Boot
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - my 3rd pair of Danner boots - this time the civilianised Danner Men's Explorer - up to the usual high standard you can expect from Danner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, I own and operate a sprinkler company, I keep these boots greased up with boot dressing and usually get about two years out of them. Everyday they get wet but my feet are always dry. I Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: JnH Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hiking boots! Take care of these and they'll last many, many years. Mine are five years old now; I've worn them in snow, desert, tropical rainforest, beaches, swamps, and of course the day-to-day slog of work. Once broken in, they are surprisingly comfortable--like heavy slippers! They've also been dunked in sea water a few times and are still good-to-go (although I highly recommend you avoid doing this). Clean and polish them often; mine look better now than when I first bought them. The leather feels more robust after breaking in and polishing a few times, too.
customer_reviews.author: SkitterPop86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as always!
customer_reviews.text: This pair fits as good or better than the previous pairs of Danner's I have owned. A First Class product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K Horinek

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to break in
customer_reviews.text: It tooks weeks to break in, but now that they are broken in I can wear them all day. Treats my feet better then my running shoes. When the sole is worn away send them to Danner and let them rebuild them. This boot should last you twenty years. Oh, and they are american made.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!
customer_reviews.text: The boot is extremely well made and comfortable. After a short break in they were good to go. A little sno-seal for the leather and I can see the boots lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: explorer rocks
customer_reviews.text: well made boots wears a size 10.5 (4E)in sneakers),ordered 2EE,had to break shoes in for a few days,recommend buying danner conditioner and clear boot dressing use shoe trees to stretch for a few days.Stitching,leather and soles durable will last for awhile.Compared to chinese made boots Danner surpasses quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Fitment didn't feel right
customer_reviews.text: Bought my size 9.5 E but it was a tad tight so I returned for another Danner style which fit. Beautiful built and looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: JJMRVCLINY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made shoes. Looks solid and strong. However, they are too heavy for long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Danner Explorer boots
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these boots for over 20 years. The quality and workmanship is unsurpassed. Great boot,extremely durable and comfortable. I've worn all types and brands of boots and I ALWAYS come back to my Danners. Don't waste your time and money on inferior products,buy a pair of these and know you own a real pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Lowman

customer_reviews.title: great boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots, very high quality , highly satisfied. Also if they weir out they are recraftable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Danner boots are like sore peter, they're hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: beau pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Love Danner  but...
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Danner boots and sad these did not fit. I ordered EE but still too narrow. Not sure why the front area/toes area would not have proper room for comfort. That said, I wear a size 8.5 EE in a Danner black work boot and they fit well are the most comfortable boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this same brand and model of boot for over 15 years. These boots are top-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Boots fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick! Boots fit like a glove. Danners are the best! I've been wearing them for work going on 19years! You will not be disappointed with this product. American craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: Philamer Juan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THESE BOOTS ARE SUPPOSED TO HAVE THE AIRTHOTIC INSERTS. THEY WERE MISSING! BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: vincent savalina

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had a 2 day break in but that's too be expected! They are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Roy Derr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: like the boot but they were 1/2 size to large returned for a different model
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: For some reass=on these weere too small and I ordered a size double E.  Can't expect much in this day and age.
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to be the same last as the Fort Lewis boots but were too tight for some reason. I will be notifying the boot seller. Hopefully I can get some kind of satisfaction. I developed a corn on my foot because of there boots. Would not recommend to a friend or anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Majcher

customer_reviews.title: cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: These boots looked like something you would buy from wally world nuf said
customer_reviews.author: Red

product_meta.title: Danner Mens Explorer 45200
product_meta.description: This adventure-ready boot from Danner offers tough construction, protection, and comfort for all levels.
feature_bullets: Danner Airthotic heel cradle and arch support
Fiberglass shank. Handcrafted, stitchdown construction for strength and stability.
Vibram 148 Kletterlift outsole offers superior traction, stability and shock absorption on rugged terrain
